details.text: Wrong Display Name 'Progress note' for http://snomed.info/sct#371532007. Valid display is one of 3 choices: 'Progress report', 'Report of subsequent visit' or 'Progress report (record artifact)' (for the language(s) 'en-US')

None of the codings provided are in the value set 'DocumentEntry.typeCode' (http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-epr-term/ValueSet/DocumentEntry.typeCode|2.0.1), and a coding from this value set is required) (codes = http://snomed.info/sct#371532007)
Stated Attachment Size 19 does not match actual attachment size 17
Attachment size is 17 bytes which exceeds the stated limit of 15 bytes
